name: Aldridge
tagline: Our clients lean on us to manage their IT
description: Aldridge is a technology management, consulting, and outsourcing company that specializes in providing best-fit IT and cloud computing solutions to midsize organizations and small organizations that are growing. We were founded in Houston, Texas in 1984. Since then, our unwavering dedication, superior technical expertise, and keen understanding of business processes have transformed us into a trusted partner of clients across the nation.
